etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یخشی (yahşı), from Old Anatolian Turkish یخشی (yaḫşı), یقشی (yaqşı), from Proto-Turkic *yakšï, ultimately a derivation from Proto-Turkic *yak- (“good”), whence Turkish yakış- (“to look good”). Doublet of yakışık.
Cognate with Turkmen ýagşy, Crimean Tatar yahşı, Tatar яхшы (yaxşı), Kyrgyz жакшы (jakşı), Kazakh жақсы (jaqsy), Uzbek yaxshi, Uyghur ياخشى (yaxshi), Azerbaijani yaxşı.
